rows.label: tev015501_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev015501_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Kaisis about the architecture of NLA.

rows.label: tev015501_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev015501_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Kaisis if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev015501_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Kaisis about Ma-non technology.

rows.label: tev015501_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Kaisis about the damage from the enemy attack.

rows.label: tev015501_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Kaisis about the city of NLA.

rows.label: tev015501_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Kaisis about recent developments.

rows.label: tev015501_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Kaisis about recent developments.

rows.label: tev015501_SEL3021
rows.name: Ask Kaisis about recent developments.

rows.label: tev015501_MSG0001
rows.name:
You want to know why this city's only half built?
Well, even if you do know, I'm going to tell you again![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG0002
rows.name:
When humanity set off for the heavens, the plan was
that the city would be constructed while we were on
board the White Whale.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG0003
rows.name:
If they had built it when they were building the ship
itself, there's no way we could have taken off on time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG0004
rows.name:
So after we left Earth, construction of the residential
unit, or "Habitat," began.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG0005
rows.name:
Everything was peachy until we got shot down by
xenos and had to land the unfinished Habitat here
on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG0006
rows.name:
Berry says I'm the world's biggest architecture nerd,
so yeah, I could go on like this all day. Let's continue
it next time, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG0008
rows.name:
When I stand here, I sometimes hear an unsettling,
bestial squealing. I always wondered what it was.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG0009
rows.name:
Well, it turns out that a group of indigens are doing
a concentrated attack on the north side of the outer
wall—that's right beyond this wall here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG0010
rows.name:
Don't worry, though—there's no way that mere beasts
are going to break through a wall built with human
ingenuity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG0011
rows.name:
Nevertheless, we can't just ignore it forever.
I want the damn things eradicated already![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG0012
rows.name:
What in the hell are the Interceptors doing?
Isn't intercepting threats supposed to be their division's
responsibility? It's in the name and everything![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG0015
rows.name:
If you want to talk about Ma-non technology,
look no further than that incredible ship of theirs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG0016
rows.name:
I asked some Ma-non how it works, and they said
maybe they'd tell me if I took them out for pizza.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG0017
rows.name:
I went ahead and shelled out for 32 large pies,
but their answer was so abstruse that I couldn't
understand any of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG0018
rows.name:
Berry says I'm the world's biggest architecture nerd.
So while that ship may not be a building, I still want
to be capable of understanding how they made it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG0025
rows.name:
It looks like they've already finished repairing the
damage that the buildings took in the attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG0026
rows.name:
Unfortunately, the resources they had to use to do it
came out of the supply that had been earmarked for
the completion of New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG0027
rows.name:
So now the city is another step away from being
finished. And as the world's biggest architecture nerd—
according to Berry—I want to see a completed New LA![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG0028
rows.name:
So I want you BLADEs to work hard to make that
happen, all right? And remember that I'll support you
however I can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG0035
rows.name:
When we locate the Lifehold Core, we can finally
resume city-building the way the Earthlife Colonization
Project intended it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG0036
rows.name:
Then we can finally say good-bye to all these unsightly
gaps throughout the city. If you wanted to jump
through them, this could be your last chance![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG0037
rows.name:
This is just between us, but when the city's finally
complete, I plan to ask Berry to start a family with me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG0038
rows.name:
A new city, a new family, and a brand-new world!
Let's both do what we must to make this dream come
true.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG1013
rows.name:
I heard a BLADE finally exterminated the indigens that
were congregating near the northern outer wall.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG1014
rows.name:
His name was...Carl, I think? Yes, that sounds right.
Regardless, I commend his efforts to protect our city![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG1015
rows.name:
We can't stand idly by while evil beings try to damage
this great structure of ours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG1016
rows.name:
This Carl understands what it means to perform
one's duties![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG2017
rows.name:
I heard a softhearted BLADE was overcome with
emotion and decided to spare the wretched indigens
that congregate near the northern outer wall.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG2018
rows.name:
I think his name was...Carl? But whatever it is,
he should resign from BLADE immediately![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG2019
rows.name:
No creature who dares to damage this incredible
structure should be shown any mercy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG2020
rows.name:
Does this Carl character even understand the degree to
which he violated his duty?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG0021
rows.name:
I heard the BLADE who spared the indigens that
congregate near the northern outer wall was killed by
those same indigens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG0022
rows.name:
I think his name was Carl? Regardless, he showed
nothing but mercy to the wretched creatures that dared
to damage this city, and yet...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015501_MSG0023
rows.name:
Well, I'm not saying he didn't have it coming,
but he IS a warrior who died in defense of the city,
and I will honor his memory accordingly.[ST:wait ]
